item.title: Russia's Putin says it would be a 'profound mistake' to dismiss Trump's push for Greenland
item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin warned it would be foolish to dismiss U.S. President Donald Trump's push for control over Greenland.

item.title: SEC votes to stop defending climate disclosure rules
item.description: Wall Street's top regulator said on Thursday it had voted to cease legal efforts to defend regulations that require companies to disclose climate-rela...

item.title: Trump withdraws nomination of Rep. Elise Stefanik for U.N. ambassador
item.description: President Donald Trump cited the narrow House majority Republicans hold in pulling the New York lawmaker's name from Senate consideration for the post...

item.title: Man charged in Molotov cocktail attack on Teslas in Las Vegas
item.description: The arrest came days after the FBI launched a task force to address attacks on locations associated with Tesla, whose CEO is DOGE chief Elon Musk.

item.title: Trump's new auto tariffs will likely drive up car prices by thousands of dollars
item.description: President Donald Trump announced the new auto duties one week before his sweeping "reciprocal tariff" plan is set to begin.
